finder

Class PluginFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • finder.PluginFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.FilenameFilter

    public class PluginFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.FilenameFilter
    PluginFilter is a class which filter the plugins in a directory. It has methods which will allow us to filter names of the files in a directory
    Author:
    Coilliaux Thibault, Deleplanque Dylan, Landschoot Ludovic, Saab Mathieu
